content.contents:
the cover of my sixth single (and first collaborative track!), 'aural.blss'
this track was a collaboration with the elusive '4evrx'. he's a very talented artist and it was a pleasure working with him - he provided the initial beat you hear, and i did all else within the track. 
the cover features lain overlayed into the classic Windows XP desktop background - maybe some of you won't understand the significance of this image, but that background holds a lot of memories for me and many others. 
it also features marisa. why? witch club, baby.
